When I enter username "standard_user" and password "secret_sauce" # stepdefinitions.LoginSteps.i_enter_username_and_password(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) And I click on the login button # stepdefinitions.LoginSteps.i_click_on_the_login_button() Then I should be redirected to the inventory page # stepdefinitions.LoginSteps.i_should_be_redirected_to_the_inventory_page() And I should see the title "Products" # stepdefinitions.LoginSteps.i_should_see_the_title(java.lang.String)
